translations.enhanced_script_description: This script automatically checks and modifies Claude Code settings file to ensure proxy configuration works. If conflicting settings exist, it will backup the original file.
translations.smart_configuration_desc: The script automatically detects and processes Claude Code settings files to ensure proxy configuration always takes effect.
translations.automatic_backup: Automatic backup of original configuration when conflicts occur
translations.fallback_support: Environment variable fallback support on failure
translations.faq_script_safe: Is it safe for the script to modify my settings file?
translations.faq_script_safe_answer: Completely safe. The script automatically creates timestamped backup files before modification, which you can restore at any time. The script only modifies proxy-related environment variables and preserves all other configurations.
translations.faq_node_required: Do I need to install Node.js?
translations.faq_node_required_answer: No separate installation needed. Claude Code is built on Node.js, so the script can directly use the existing Node.js environment.
translations.faq_restore_settings: How do I restore original settings?
translations.faq_restore_settings_answer: Find the settings.json.backup-* file in the ~/.claude/ directory and rename it to settings.json to restore.
translations.prerequisite_description: Please ensure that you have the official Claude Code installed on your system
translations.expires_at_help: Fill in 0 to trigger automatic refresh to get correct expiration time

translations.test_failed_network: Test failed, please check network connection
translations.url_must_use_http_or_https: URL must use HTTP or HTTPS protocol
translations.quick_setup_desc: Use our dedicated configuration scripts to quickly complete client setup with automatic backup and connection testing.
translations.faq_script_safe_answer_new: Completely safe. The configuration script automatically creates timestamped backup files before modification, which you can restore at any time. The script only modifies proxy-related configurations while preserving all other user settings.
translations.faq_setup_difficulty_answer: Very simple! Just run the configuration script, enter the proxy address and API key, and the script will automatically complete all configuration work, including connection test validation.
translations.faq_restore_settings_answer_new: Find backup files (like settings.json.backup-* or config.toml.backup-*) in the ~/.claude/ or ~/.codex/ directories and rename them to the original filename to restore. You can also reconfigure using the script.
translations.faq_connection_failed: What to do if connection test fails?
translations.faq_connection_failed_answer: Please check: 1) Is CCCC proxy running; 2) Is proxy address correct; 3) Is API key valid; 4) Is network connection normal. The script will provide specific error information to help diagnose.
translations.faq_config_files_answer: Claude Code: ~/.claude/settings.json; Codex: ~/.codex/config.toml and ~/.codex/auth.json. Scripts will automatically create these files and configure them correctly.
translations.prerequisite_check: Ensure Claude Code or Codex is installed and you have a valid API key
Ensure Claude Code or Codex is installed and you have a valid API key
